response.overview: In the twilight of their lives, elderly people who wander around the scene for video shoots and work late into the night editing. Director Ra Young-soo of 'Silver Nest', who is leading them, has no time to rest as he applies for grants and preaches aspirations. What are the plans of these elderly people, who want to tell their stories rather than to kill time, and to earn money from those stories, and what is their goal?
response.title: Plan 'W' (White)
